items.value: A strange office chair, but useful for offices! Always bringing a lot of joy for those who attempt to ride it!
Happy Christmas, here's a free item!
Nothing's more celebratory than Happy Holidays itself! Always celebrating holidays and coming with surprises!
If they see any student sneaking out of their classes, They will always alert Professor Baldi about the unfortunate student!
If it sees you, try not to get grabbed if it' is going in your direction.
A shy clock that likes to hang around on walls, he definitely won't like someone to interrupt his Tick-a-Tocks
He looks for a mate to show his talents on drums, despite them being incredibly loud!
While you look it, you will see the world in it's eyes.
